H0.text: What is the name of the agreement under which passport controls have been abolished in 22 EU and 4 non-EU states. Dublin Agreement

H1.text: What is the name of the agreement under which passport controls have been abolished in 22 EU and 4 non-EU states. Shuman Plan

H2.text: What is the name of the agreement under which passport controls have been abolished in 22 EU and 4 non-EU states. Maastricht Treaty

H3.text: What is the name of the agreement under which passport controls have been abolished in 22 EU and 4 non-EU states. Shengen

A4.text: The Schengen Agreement led to the abolition of internal border checks in the Schengen Area.

A5.text: The Schengen Area includes 22 EU and 4 non-EU states.
